extension.description: This addon can play and test various video and audio content from various sources supported by Streamlink resolver library. It can also playback MPEG-DASH streams.
extension.disclaimer: This addon does not provide any content, its sole purpose is to resolve web urls with the help of Streamlink resolver library
extension.news: [B]1.1.0[/B] - 04-06-2018 - Added &quality= plugin route call for manual quality selection (overrides setting in options) - Added MPEG-DASH playback capability - Added MPEG-DASH url output for resolved urls through streamlink - Improved README.md
